DOC.brief_summary: Background : Psychotherapy effective treatment generalize anxiety disorder comparison no-treatment control . Instead create new overall treatment-packets within medical meta-model , complementary approach investigate clinical research design may lie understand already effective psychotherapy . Treatment manual protocols allow relatively high degree freedom therapist ' behavior implement overall treatment manual . There lack systematical knowledge therapist customize overall protocol . The present design experimentally examine 3 type conduct 15 session time-limited cognitive-behavioral therapy ( CBT ) protocol relation therapist ' protocol adherence treatment efficacy . Methods/design : This trial investigate 3 different type customize well-introduced CBT-protocol use dyadic peer tutor methodology ( priming ) . The individual GAD randomly assign 3 priming condition ( resource prim vs. supportive resource prim vs. adherence prim ) . Participants ' treatment allocation perform randomly , therapist 's assignment peer tutor partner prim condition base mutual agreement . Treatment outcomes assess following level : Observer base in-session outcome , post-session outcome session 1 15 , treatment outcome post assessment 6-months follow-up assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Microtuning Bonafide Treatment GAD Patients - A Randomized Controlled Trial .
DOC.detailed_description: Aims trial . This trial investigate 3 different type customize well-introduced CBT-protocol ( Zinbarg , Craske , & Barlow , 2006 ) use dyadic peer tutor methodology ( priming ) . The participant randomly assign 3 priming condition : ( ) Resource priming ( Flückiger , Wüsten et al. , 2010 ; Flückiger & Grosse Holtforth , 2008a ) ; ( b ) Supportive resource priming ( c ) Adherence priming . The main research question : 1 . In-session outcome . Using videotape , observer-based videoanalyses conduct : ( ) Do resource prim condition show comparable observer-based therapist 's adherence comparison adherence prim condition ( Zinbarg et al. , 2007 ) ? ( b ) Do resource prim condition show resource activate micro intervention adherence prim condition ( ROMA ; Flückiger & Grosse Holtforth , 2008a/b ) ? ( c ) Are in-session process predictor mediator session therapy outcome ( Flückiger et al. , 2009 ; Flückiger et al. , 2013 ) ? 2 . Post-session outcome . Are differences post-session outcome 3 prim condition ? Furthermore : Are post-session outcome along symptom change predictor mediator therapy outcome ( Flückiger et al. , 2009 ; Flückiger et al. , 2012 ) ? 3 . Treatment outcome . Do show resource prim condition comparable efficacy GAD outcomes , general outcomes dropout rate comparison adherence prim condition ? Methods/Design . This study randomize control trial three active treatment arm . This trial conduct Swiss psychotherapy outpatient clinic Department Psychology University Zürich . The treatment base treatment protocol ( Zinbarg et al. , 2006 ) . Overall , 3 x 4 design one between-subject factor ( resource prim vs. supportive resource prim vs. problem prim ) one within-subject factor ( time : pre , mid ( session 6 ) , post ( session 14 ) , 6-months follow-up ) . Participants . Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria . Participants include study : ( ) 18 year old ; ( b ) agree inform consent , ( c ) sufficient knowledge German ; ( ) fulfill diagnostic criterion GAD DSM-IV criterion . Participants exclude : ( ) score 2 high suicide item BDI and/or active suicidal plan accord diagnostic screening interview , ( b ) current medication psychotic bipolar disorder , ( c ) current treatment professional psychotherapist . Further , prescribe medication anxiety depressive disorder lead exclusion dosage remain constant least one month . The presence comorbidity result exclusion GAD foreground accord severity rating Diagnostic Interview DSM-diagnoses . Recruitment . Participants recruit mean advertisement newspaper internet forum . The high-circulation newspaper deliver free Swiss public transport system . Interested individual participation contact study office via SMS , e-mail phone . Screened positive patient invited intake assessment verify inclusion exclusion criterion base standardized interview . Participants screen positive informed appropriate treatment via phone call request face-to-face contact . Randomization treatment allocation . After meet inclusion criterion , patient randomize 3 condition ( resource priming , supportive resource priming , adherence priming ) . Treatment allocation perform randomly online application full randomization . In way , aim ensure trial arm balance respect patient ' baseline characteristic . Randomization procedure conduct two independent research assistant . Because patient treated CBT-manual , patient blind treatment allocation inform randomization procedure . GAD treatment protocol . CBT-manual ( Zinbarg et al. , 2006 ) : Traditional cognitive-behavioral therapy ( CBT ) GAD typically consist psycho education generalize anxiety disorder , relaxation training ( RT ) , cognitive restructuring ( CR ) in-vivo situational exposure patient overt behavioral avoidance ( e.g. , Barlow , Rapee , & Brown , 1992 ; Borkovec & Costello , 1993 ) . Furthermore , imagery exposure GAD-specific form in-sensu exposition apply reduce experiential avoidance base well-introduced CBT-manual ( Zinbarg et al. , 2006 ) . The manualized therapy follow usual time-limited treatment format 14 session 50 minute booster session 6-months ( total 15 session ) . Tandem peer tutoring ( prim ) . To investigate various type conduct standardize CBT-protocol , therapists tutor peer dyad ( tandem peer tutor ) . Immediate session 1 5 , therapist require contact tandem-partner face-to-face via self-phone deliberate forthcoming session 5 10 minute brief communication ( priming ; comparable procedure see Flückiger & Grosse Holtforth , 2008 ) . The tandem peer tutoring group three condition : 1 . Resource priming : Immediately session 1 5 , therapists five-minute conversation implement strengths-based micro-interventions forthcoming session . Strengths-based micro-interventions address therapist explicit focus patient ' preexist strengths ability , subtle change improvement therapy ( potential recources ) well motivational preparedness , readiness goal ( motivational resource ; Grawe , 2006 ; Flückiger et al. , 2010 ) . 2 . Supportive resource priming : The supportive resource prim condition protocol resource prim condition ( 5 brief tandem peer tutorings ) . The difference procedure therapists allow integrate helpful significant person patient ( partner best friend ) around session 1 7 encourage support patient realize treatment plan ( active integration interpersonal resource ) . However , integration significant person touch CBT-treatment protocol . 3 . Adherence priming : Immediately session 1 5 , therapists five-minute conversation implement disorderspecific intervention describe treatment protocol . These communication focus therapist ' understanding patient GAD related comorbidities issue address prescriptive treatment protocol . Therapists . Twelve advance trainee least 2 year post-graduate training recruit local ( CBT ) -training center . The majority therapists experience study therapist prior randomize control trial . All therapist participate initial 16-hour workshop present developer treatment manual ( Zinbarg et al. , 2006 ) . In addition peer-tutorings ( priming ) , therapists regular supervision small group 14-day basis . The supervision conduct mixed group 3 prim condition . All supervisor also participate initial 16-hour workshop . To respect coordinate therapist ' preference ( e.g . preference work day time schedule ) assign joint face-to-face session study start . All therapist give verbal write consent select peer-tutoring partner prim condition . Assessments . At intake , GAD-diagnosis core symptomatology identify accord structure interview section GAD ( DIPS ; Margraf , Schneider , & Ehlers , 1994 ) . Furthermore , GAD-criteria assess self-reports . The individual worry identify use Penn State Worry Questionnaire ( PSWQ ) Worry Domain Questionnaire ( WDQ ) . Mental disorder Axis I assess use face-to-face diagnostic interview Axis I ( Diagnostisches Interview für Psychische Störungen für DSM-IV , SCID-I ) Axis II ( Strukturiertes Klinisches Interview für DSM-IV , Achse-II , Persönlichkeitsstörungen , SKID-II ; Wittchen , Zaudig , & Fydrich , 1997 ) . PSWQ , Beck Anxiety Inventory ( BAI ) State-Trait Anxiety ( STAI ) use GAD-outcomes . Premature termination trial , interpersonal problem strengths inventory , behavioral inhibition activation scale , well resource potential questionnaire use general outcome . The outcome measure take intake , directly session 6 ( end priming ) , session 14 ( post-assessment ) , 6- month follow-up . The following process measure examine : ( ) Post-session report ( Flückiger et al. , 2010 ) , work alliance ( Munder et al. , 2009 ) symptom change ( BAI ) conduct session 1 15 ( b ) In-session process : Using record videotape , adherence rating ( Zinbarg et al. , 2007 ) , Resource-Oriented Microprocess Analysis ( ROMA-P/T , Flückiger & Grosse Holtforth , 2008 ) level explication scale ( Sachse , 1992 ) conduct session 2 , 5 8 . Study participant view . After contaciting study administration , participant 's information contain precise description inclusion exclusion criterion , structure treatment manual well data collection procedure include video recording . Confidentiality collect data confirm . Volontarines participation emphasize opportunity terminate treatment every timepoint treatment cancelation conduct data . Furthermore , insurance possible negative outcome clinical trial contract . Statistical Analysis . In order handle hierarchical data structure ( session Level 1 nest within patient Level 2 therapist Level 3 ) , hierarchical linear model ( HLM ) time within-groups factor treatment condition between-groups factor use main research question . The analysis conduct intention-to-treat sample well completer sample . To investigate possible patient ' therapist ' effect impact therapy outcome , patient ' therapist ' pretreatment characteristic investigate outcome predictor Level 2 3 . Clinical significance define ( ) statistically reliable change accord Reliable Change Index ( RCI ) , ( b ) within two standard deviation nonclinical group post-assessment follow-up ( Jacobson & Truax , 1991 ) . All analysis run HLM R packet . Sample size . Based power analysis G*Power optimal sample size Alpha-error 5 % , Beta-error 80 % well correlation coefficient r = .30 repeat assessment 60 participant , i.e . 20 participant prim condition .

( Further , prescribe medication anxiety depressive disorder lead exclusion dosage remain constant least one month .
